solution_line_template: Kiki spends {hat_money_percentage}*${total_money}=${<<{hat_money_percentage}*{total_money}={money_on_hats}>>{money_on_hats}} of her money on hats.
The amount she spends on buying scarves is ${total_money}-${money_on_hats}=${<<{total_money}-{money_on_hats}={money_on_scarves}>>{money_on_scarves}}
If each scarf is sold at ${scarf_price}, Kiki will buy ${money_on_scarves}/${scarf_price}=<<{money_on_scarves}/{scarf_price}={num_scarves}>>{num_scarves} scarves.
